name: Nine Ladies Dancing
description:
SUBMISSION FOR CRIMBO GAMES JAM

Ladies need to collect their Fruit Baskets. Move each basket onto the correct platform of the lady moving to collect it. 

"Left Click" to select a basket and then "Left Click" another to swap them over.

Each fruit basket corresponds with the colour of the ladies dresses. Earn points for giving each lady the correct basket, see how long you can keep it up for.

Merry Christmas!

The theme for the Game Jam was "12 days of Christmas" and each entry got a different gift (e.g. partridge in a pear tree,  five gold rings) so at the end there are 12 games for the 12 days of Christmas. This is my entry "Nine Ladies Dancing".
